MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 01-DEC-2020 16:19.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Mavisbank Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.21pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Mavisbank Avenue substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.29pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
